entries.description: Interconnectors make renewables’ output more reliable but are vulnerable to security threats

entries.title: Tom Nairn, political theorist, 1932-2023
entries.description: He was best known for his writing on the fragmenting of the British union, which he viewed as inevitable

entries.title: Netherlands and Japan join US in restricting chip exports to China
